title: Rainy night city driving with multiple braking events.
caption: The ego vehicle is driving slowly on a rainy night in a busy city street with multiple braking events.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 1 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is rainy (softRainNight). The ego vehicle is moving slowly (average speed â‰ˆ 0.5 m/s). There are 25 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The road is wet from the rain, and there are several other cars on the street, some of which are also braking frequently. The traffic lights are visible in the distance, and there are a few pedestrians walking on the sidewalk. The weather is dark and rainy, which affects visibility.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly to maintain safety in the rainy conditions. It brakes frequently to avoid collisions with other vehicles that are also braking frequently due to the slippery road surface. The driver must remain vigilant and maintain a safe distance from other cars to avoid accidents. The presence of pedestrians on the sidewalk also requires the driver to be cautious and attentive to their movements.
